attributes.action: Give newly qualified nurses full time jobs! - the NHS is understaffed - we want to work! give us the oppertunity!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NURSES NEED YOUR HELP

I am a third year student nurse, I am about to qualify in August 2007. The problem is that there are not enough vacancies. The is crazy! 

WARDS ARE UNDERSTAFFED

How can Hospitals reduce infections if there are too few nurses?
Who will care for your elderly relatives?

The problem is that newly qualified nurses need to complete a preceptorship programme - but NHS Trusts do not have the funding to create new posts!

NO NEWLY QUALIFIED NURSE VACANCIES = UNDERSTAFFED WARDS
UNDERSTAFFED WARDS = POOR PATIENT CARE
POOR PATIENT CARE = UNACCEPTABLE

Student nurses at Degree level, after an arduous 3 year course are being offered monthly contracts of just 15 hours per week! This means that a newly qualified nurse could potentially earn the same as a shop assistant - Student nurses want to work!

WE WANT:
Guaranteed preceptorship programmes for all newly qualified staff nurses
Full time posts for qualified nurses
Flexible working patterns

PLEASE HELP US!
